notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was partially supported by NIH grant R01AI141889, by South Dakota State University agricultural experiment station (AES) 3AH-477, by National Science Foundation/EPSCoR ( http://www.nsf.gov/od/iia/programs/epscor/index.jsp) award IIA1335423, and by the state of South Dakota’s Governor’s Office of Economic Development as a South Dakota Research Innovation Center.
